column4: im having a seriously annoying problem. i upgraded my 32 bit ubuntu 8.04 to have 8GB of memory. i had to install server headers to get it all to recognize. this all worked, but now tons of dialogue boxes are completely black and such. i have been using this install flawlessly for a long while with no issues. help! :)
id consider 64bit ubuntu to support that ram
last tiem i tried 64 bit, tons of apps i used seemed very unstable and crashed a lot
